Enterocolitides:[[]]
Enterocolitis inflammation involving both small intestine and colon:[[7422], [7099], [7040], [7124], [4790], [3586], [50943], [4282], [929], [64127], [196], [90865], [331], [4092], [7177]]
Enterocolitis:[[7099], [7422], [7124], [7040], [3569], [3586], [4790], [1401], [3576], [3605], [4879], [50943], [64127], [857], [4282], [4153], [929], [1950], [4314], [56729], [3481], [196], [90865], [331], [58484], [3689], [149233], [4057], [3551], [3566], [1673], [121278], [4092], [2169], [1839], [112744], [55054], [406933], [11082], [55894], [728], [5293], [6283], [1736], [23643], [3587], [6583], [10747], [7177], [1373], [9075], [3776], [554210], [6036], [2760], [3588], [59307], [84666], [100302276], [171389], [55505], [51070]]
Inflammation of small intestine and colon:[[7157], [3570], [7422], [6768], [1956], [57016], [7124], [7040], [1234], [3091], [1636], [79626], [6774], [4790], [3586], [5468], [5243], [7099], [207], [976], [29126], [4524], [3479], [7421], [1499], [5594], [5728], [4851], [3845], [23411], [1080], [7852], [351], [1432], [960], [3958], [355], [6387], [4313], [3146], [673], [2475], [2064], [8743], [999], [5970], [5595], [3815], [3162], [3688], [596], [332], [4609], [2944], [729230], [3383], [2146], [6772], [4780], [1026], [5599], [4193], [672], [3606], [3934], [2932], [7097], [9429], [2100], [50943], [4843], [6347], [5290], [1906], [51738], [64771], [3659], [4282], [2150], [6863], [142], [3106], [356], [5747], [7132], [103], [10413], [6714], [59272], [64127], [3135], [28], [3480], [6647], [387], [3075], [581], [2152], [9314], [3630], [6532], [3717], [1803], [9368], [90865], [196], [959], [54106], [5879], [7098], [929], [472], [3600], [6352], [1378], [8842], [4089], [841], [958], [2950], [5133], [10135], [5465], [2896], [2309], [378938], [2532], [1045], [5328], [3627], [2908], [4288], [7128], [3791], [1471], [1869], [7431], [285], [1786], [650], [7052], [9021], [1493], [682], [920], [5460], [5979], [3620], [1385], [1543], [19], [5027], [2247], [675], [5621], [6584], [5467], [3320], [5925], [11093], [255738], [7442], [1027], [5562], [10891], [2149], [5315], [4000], [1994], [3690], [6403], [3315], [331], [4321], [7424], [6868], [3119], [10855], [6648], [7057], [4312], [3172], [7941], [2697], [6790], [3672], [3308], [4792], [8795], [4968], [7474], [8600], [5071], [2034], [7048], [2305], [6469], [2260], [3065], [634]]
ENTEROCOLITIS:[[7099], [7422], [7124], [7040], [3569], [3586], [4790], [1401], [3576], [3605], [4879], [50943], [64127], [857], [4282], [4153], [929], [1950], [4314], [56729], [3481], [196], [90865], [331], [58484], [3689], [149233], [4057], [3551], [3566], [1673], [121278], [4092], [2169], [1839], [112744], [55054], [406933], [11082], [55894], [728], [5293], [6283], [1736], [23643], [3587], [6583], [10747], [7177], [1373], [9075], [3776], [554210], [6036], [2760], [3588], [59307], [84666], [100302276], [171389], [55505], [51070]]
